name: agent_generated_character_music_mcp
exhibit_name: Music Production Company - Character-Driven Music Generator
description: Complete music production company MCP server that transforms narrative characters into fully-realized musical artists. Features advanced character analysis (three-layer methodology), introspective artist story generation, AI producer guidance with Suno AI best practices, and comprehensive music bible creation. Generates production-ready Suno AI commands with meta tag optimization, troubleshooting guides, and album narratives. Supports both basic character-to-music workflow and full production company workflow with artist backstories and producer oversight.
description_for_agent: Music production company MCP server with 9 tools: analyze_character (three-layer character extraction), generate_artist_story (creates introspective artist narratives from character bibles), generate_musical_persona (maps characters to musical identities), analyze_production (AI producer tool with Suno-specific guidance), create_music_bible (comprehensive production documentation), get_suno_knowledge (fetches Suno AI best practices), create_suno_command (generates optimized prompts), complete_workflow (basic character-to-music), and complete_music_production_workflow (full production company workflow). Transforms narrative text into complete music production packages including artist stories, producer notes, song blueprints, and optimized Suno AI commands.

SUNO_COOKIE.description: Optional Suno AI session cookie for direct API integration. If not provided, server operates in standalone mode generating commands without executing them.

TWOCAPTCHA_KEY.description: Optional 2Captcha API key for solving CAPTCHAs in Suno AI integration. Only needed if using direct Suno API calls.

tools.analyze_character: Extract detailed character profiles using three-layer methodology (Skin/Flesh/Core)
tools.generate_artist_story: Create introspective artist backstory from character bible with themes and journey
tools.generate_musical_persona: Map character traits to musical genres, vocals, and artistic identity
tools.analyze_production: AI producer analysis providing Suno-optimized production guidance
tools.create_music_bible: Generate comprehensive production guide with song blueprints and prompts
tools.get_suno_knowledge: Fetch current Suno AI best practices, meta tags, and genre tips
tools.create_suno_command: Generate optimized Suno AI prompts with meta tags and variations
tools.complete_workflow: Basic workflow: character analysis → persona → Suno commands
tools.complete_music_production_workflow: Full production: character → story → persona → producer → music bible
